home.title: Atlantic Pine Education
home.description: We are dedicated to serving as a conduit for cultural exchange between China and the United States.

services.title: US K12 Schools
services.description: We offer personalized services for Chinese students aiming to enter US K12 schools

services.title: China-US Exchange Students
services.description: We facilitate a transformative China-US exchange student program, fostering cultural exploration and personal growth for future leaders in a safe and supportive environment.

services.title: Entrepreneurial Successor Development Program
services.description: We cultivate future business leaders by providing comprehensive training and development to equip them with the necessary knowledge, skills, and a global perspective.

services.title: Summer Camp
services.description: We offer a meticulously planned summer camp program, providing students with academic and cultural immersion in top U.S. high schools and universities to unlock their potential and expand their international perspective.
features: Immersive experience in top U.S. schools
Comprehensively enhance students' capabilities through diverse activities

services.title: College Application
services.description: We offer end-to-end expert guidance, covering college selection, application preparation, and post-application support, ensuring students secure admission to their dream universities and helping them prepare for their next chapter in life.

services.title: Mini Exchange Program
services.description: We provide students with a short-term yet in-depth international learning experience, including study abroad, cultural exchanges, and language skill enhancement.
